Title: Episode #1.3
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall (teleplay by), Ruby Rae Spiegel (teleplay by), Joe Penhall (story by)

Plot: Dr Wendy Carr joins Holden and Tench in their first success, when their insights lead to an arrest.
